text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today's the day that Special Week<n>and I agreed upon to do
some training<n>outside the academy. Or, well, that<n>was the
plan...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff...
choice_data_list: What's up? You seem out of it.
What's up? You seem out of it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? D-do I? But I feel fine!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: A-all righty! Let's keep giving it our all<n>today!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I suspect that something is up with<n>Special Week, but I let it
go for the time<n>being to focus on her training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Then...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Phew! ♪ Another day, another great<n>training session! I feel
like I could go<n>for another round of running, though!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I have an idea! Trainer, how about<n>I run on my way
back? It'll be like<n>extra train—

text_block_list.name: Young Boy
text_block_list.text: Mommy! I want a croquette! Iwant it!

text_block_list.name: Mother
text_block_list.text:
If you eat now, you won't have any<n>space for dinner!
We're going home,<n>dear.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh, it's nothing! It just<n>reminded me of my own mom,
that's<n>all.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I also used to bug her for things and<n>get scolded for it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Of course I do! But... she's so far<n>away. I can't just meet
her on a<n>whim.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: We did actually talk on the phone<n>yesterday, though.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
She told me about our neighbor's<n>cow and how it gave birth
to a new<n>calf recently. She also talked about<n>our carrots
and how they're all<n>growing really big.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
We talked a lot, and well... It made me<n>miss home, so I told
her I missed her<n>carrot stew.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
She asked me if I was feeling down<n>and if I was okay. She
told me not to<n>push myself too hard. She sounded<n>really
worried.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I want to make Mom and Mama<n>proud, but all I do is cause
worry...
choice_data_list: So that's why you're out of it today.
So that's why you're out of it today.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Sigh... If only she werehere now...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Then I'd be able to tell her in<n>person—that it's a bit lonely,
but I'm<n>still doing my best.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oh... S-silly me. I shouldn't talk about<n>this with you. I don't
want to cause<n>you any more trouble than I already<n>have.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, let's hurry up and go back<n>to the academy! Wait,
what's that?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Over there... at the bookstore!<n>Suzuka's on the front page of
that<n>magazine!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We decide to take a detour and stop<n>by the bookstore to
pick up a copy of<n>the magazine in question.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Isn't this magazine super<n>famous?! I've even seen
it back at<n>home in Hokkaido!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka's incredible, isn't she?<n>She's always running in
one race or<n>another.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hm, I need to stop moping around<n>and work hard enough to
be on the<n>cover of magazines.
choice_data_list:
That would show your mom how well you're
doing too.

That would show your mom how well you're
doing too.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? What would? Oh wait, I get it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
If I make to the front page of a<n>magazine, I'd be able to
show my<n>mom that I'm doing fine all on my<n>own.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm sure that'd make her happy!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Thanks, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
There might not be vast pastures<n>here for me to run
through, and my<n>favorite carrot fields might be missing,<n>
but...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'll still try my hardest! I'll do<n>whatever it takes to become
the best<n>version of myself!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week solemnly gazes into the<n>evening sky. Her
complexion is one of<n>sadness, but her eyes tell a different<n>
story—the girl is nothing if not<n>determined.
